title: What's in a play: dramatic action
creator_credit: Film Associates of California and James Stinson
brief_description: Analyses dramatic action, a basic element of all plays, and illustrates it through the use of simple drama - a conflict between a salesman and a customer. Understanding dramatic action can help the student to analyse the structure of any play, and enchance their enjoyment of it.
